message: Let's agree on this generous offer from my side, a 60/40 split for me. It's fair considering the game dynamics and inflation!

Given that you face 10% depreciation per round while I face 5%, this split is actually favorable for both of us if we agree now. If we continue to the next round, you'll lose more value than I will. Let's make a deal now and both walk away with more value.

Bob, I understand your point about depreciation, but I am also the one making the proposals now. My depreciation is a factor, but so is your desire to end the game with a reasonable amount. Let's meet in the middle. 55/45 split. Accept this time!
